attributes.additional_details:
Sadiq Khan is an extremely divisive politician, and has not done anything worthy of receiving an honour such as a knighthood.
He has helped to ruin the economy of Greater London.
attributes.background: Abolish the knighthood for Sadiq Khan, or withdraw it.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed or blocked.
